meanings.definition: Superlative form of fit, suitable or appropriate
meanings.sent1: The jacket was the fittest choice for the cold weather.
meanings.sent2: She picked the fittest color for her room decor.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a swimsuit to a formal event would be the fittest fashion disaster.
meanings.sent4: His fittest decision was to bring an umbrella on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The fittest shoes for hiking had excellent grip and support.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of fit, physically strong and healthy
meanings.sent1: The athlete was the fittest competitor in the race.
meanings.sent2: Eating fruits and vegetables helps you stay fittest.
meanings.sent3: The fittest dog in the park could fetch a ball in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her fittest workout routine included running and weightlifting.
meanings.sent5: The fittest tree in the forest stood tall and sturdy.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of fit, having the highest degree of ability or skill
meanings.sent1: The fittest student in the class aced every test.
meanings.sent2: Practice makes you fittest in playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The fittest chef in the kitchen could whip up a meal in minutes.
meanings.sent4: His fittest talent was painting beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The fittest mechanic fixed the car with precision and speed.
